item.title: Bottled Twilight
item.fluff: This black glass bottle holds the power to turn all light to dusk

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You remove the cork from the bottle, and until the end of the encounter all light within 10 squares of the bottle becomes dim light.

item.title: Fortune's Nod
item.fluff: You have been gifted fortune, but it only occasionally manifests in noticeably ways

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Trigger: You make a saving throw and dislike the result
Effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to the triggering saving throw.

item.title: Gather Flames
item.fluff: You reach out and pluck a flame from its fuel source, then effortlessly carry it to a new location

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: You pick up and adjacent fire that can be as large as a torch flame, carrying it with a free hand without being burned. If you are still carrying the fire at the end of the encounter, the fire goes out.

The fire requires no fuel while you carry it. You can place it on a surface or an unattended object as a minor action. You cannot place it on a creature. Once out of your hand, the fire requires fuel as normal.

item.title: Ride the Wind
item.fluff: You whisper quiet words to a group of mounts, giving them the ability to run like the wind

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: Close burst 10 (up to 8 creatures with the Mount subtype); Each target gains a +2 bonus to speed for 8 hours.

item.title: Scent of Gold
item.fluff: You've got a nose for gold, allowing you to ferret out hidden valuables

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Effect: For the next 10 minutes, you can smell the presence of gold, silver, and valuable gems within 5 squares of you. This allows you to make Perception checks to locate such valuables, even when they are hidden from view.
Level 13: This power becomes an encounter power.

item.title: True Kiss of the Mistress
item.fluff: A member of fey royalty gave you his or her true kiss of trust, imparting wards of protection against enemies that would harm you - even if you later break that trust

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against effects that immobilize, restrain, slow, or stun.

block.name: Attack Power
block.line: Trigger: You take damage from an attack and the attacker has combat advantage against you
Effect: The attacker is dazed until the end of its next turn, and you can shift 1 square.
Level 18: Teleport up to 5 squares. This power gains the Teleportation keyword.
Level 23: Teleport up to 7 squares. This power gains the Teleportation keyword.
Level 28: Teleport up to 10 squares. This power gains the Teleportation keyword.
